activities: Whodini collects named-entities and meta-data around named-entities to create professional profiles of employees in large companies. We show the profile to employees for their approval. After the employee has curated the profile and approved it, it is visible to the rest of the company on searching for expertise.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization data is collected, but is not manually processed.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
